info.description: OncoKB™ is a precision oncology knowledge base developed at Memorial Sloan Kettering Cancer Center that contains biological and clinical information about genomic alterations in cancer.
info.title: OncoKB™ APIs

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number of the requested page

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.
